info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 403 Forbidden
Connection: close
Content-Length: 16
Cache-Control: private, max-age=0, no-store, no-cache, must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0
Cf-Ray: 703448a469c905c6-IAD
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8
Date: Fri, 29 Apr 2022 01:32:25 GMT
Expect-Ct: max-age=604800, report-uri="https://report-uri.cloudflare.com/cdn-cgi/beacon/expect-ct"
Expires: Thu, 01 Jan 1970 00:00:01 GMT
Referrer-Policy: same-origin
Server: cloudflare
Vary: Accept-Encoding
X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN

error code: 1020
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: CNAME Fingerprint
author: pdteam
info.description: A CNAME DNS record was discovered.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43218
;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 43218
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 1, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 NS

;; ANSWER SECTION:
doc.covoiturage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	CNAME	hosting.gitbook.io.

;; AUTHORITY SECTION:
gitbook.io.	3600	IN	SOA	dahlia.ns.cloudflare.com. dns.cloudflare.com. 2275194161 10000 2400 604800 3600
